name: Don't Kill Death (Or Die Trying)
description:
Spawn and slaughter countless souls to help Soulvester make it through the night and find a cure for death!

Controlled with the mouse only.

Everything made from scratch within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46. The theme was "Keep It Alive". This is my first ever game jam and the first thing I've made in GameMaker Studio 2.

I will be posting a complete development timelapse on my website soon! http://www.MadeByChaz.com

CONTROLS:
Left click to move
Right click to spawn
To access the Soul Hole upgrade store, you can either: click the middle mouse button, press space or click the soul orb in the top right corner.
